guide.planttech2.autoreplanting.text: All crops in PlantTech 2 are auto-replanted; right-clicking to harvest the crops when fully grown will generate any drops and reset the plant to the seedling state. Until the Fertility trait is increased this will usually result in no extra seed drops, as a seed was needed for replanting.
guide.planttech2.chipalyzer.text:
The Chipalyzer can analyze various items and record the data on Blank Upgrade Chips. The resulting chips can be slotted into PlantTech2 equipment to enhance its capabilities. (Some effects are stackable; refer to each chip's tooltip for more info.) Some of these chips can also be upgraded; the following pages will have more on this.














These chips are upgradeable with standard Chip Upgrade Packs.

Attack Chip: Iron Sword
Attack Speed Chip: Golden Sword

Armor Chip: Iron Chestplate
Toughness Chip: Diamond Chestplate

Breakdown Rate Chip: Golden Pickaxe










This set of chips is upgradeable with their own special Upgrade Packs.

Capacity Chip: Battery (0.5kBE)
Reactor Chip: Solar Focus MkI
Harvestlevel Chip: Wooden Pickaxe
Harvest Level Chip: Diamond Pickaxe













The following chips are used to unlock additional right-click functions for the Multi-Tool. They are not upgradeable.

Unlock Chip (Axe): Iron Axe
Unlock Chip (Hoe): Iron Hoe
Unlock Chip (Shears): Shears
Unlock Chip (Shovel): Iron Shovel


It is also possible to program Upgrade Chips with Enchantment data. These do not have multiple levels (so don't waste a Fortune III - you'll get a Fortune I chip), but the effects are stackable with multiple chips.
guide.planttech2.cleaning_containers.tex: Useless DNA containers can be cleaned up for reuse, by placing them in the DNA cleaner.
guide.planttech2.combining_genes.text: DNA containers can be combined in the DNA combiner. Through this process the DNA sequences will be mixed, with the lower values being dominant. (There is no dominant crop type however; that will be selected at random.) The used DNA containers will not be consumed, so this can be an effective way to backup a DNA sequence as you attempt to isolate a gene.
guide.planttech2.compressor.text: The Compressor converts crop particles into items. Some particles have more multiple options.
Now the last step in getting personalized seeds is to put a DNA container and 500 biomass in the Seed Constructor.
Biomass is produced by the Seed Squeezer - the same stuff used in the Machinebulb Reprocessor. Again, the used DNA container will not be consumed.
All traits that are not present in the DNA container will be reset to their initial value. The default crop type is Carrot, and for the traits have a look at "Crossbreeding: Crop traits"
guide.planttech2.crop_not_growing.text:
The easiest way to check, if the conditions are matched, is using the analyser. Just right-click on the crop and you will get a message with every condition that is not matched.
The conditions are:

- Water source near enough
- Light level high enough
- Right soil
- Right temperature
guide.planttech2.croptraits.text:
**Growth Rate**
- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Reduce the amount of time needed for the crop to grow.
- Time per Stage = 90s - level * 6

**Sensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level 10
- Not yet implemented.

**Light Sensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 14
- Defines the minimum light level needed for the plant to grow.
- Minimum needed lightlevel = 14 - level

**Water Sensitivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 8
- Defines the max distance from water that that the crop will be able to grow.
- Distance = 1 + level

**Temperature Tolerance**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 4
- Allows the crop to grow in temperatures outside of its native climate.
- Allowed temperature = default temperature +- level





**Productivity**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 5
- Increases the amount of products dropped

**Fertility**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 5
- Increases the amount of seeds dropped

**Spreading Speed**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Not yet implemented


**Gene Strength**

- Minimum level: 0
- Maximum level: 10
- Not yet implemented

**Energy Value**

- Minimum level: 1
- Maximum level: 10
- Increases the amount of energy produced in the seed squeezer
- Energy = level * 20
guide.planttech2.dna_cleaner.text: The DNA Cleaner sanitizes used DNA containers and prepares them for reuse.
guide.planttech2.dna_combiner.text: The DNA Combiner combines two sequences of DNA (lower values are dominant). The used sample sequences are not lost.
guide.planttech2.dna_extractor.text: The DNA Extractor stores the DNA sequence of a crop seed into an empty DNA container. This process destroys the seed.
guide.planttech2.dna_remover.text: The DNA Remover removes a single trait, selected randomly. Should be used to reduce the sequence to only good traits.
guide.planttech2.energy_supplier.text: The Energy Supplier does what the names says, it supplies energy for blocks like electric fences.
guide.planttech2.extracting_genes.text:
Once you got traits you want to keep, you need to extract the whole DNA sequence.
Therefore, put a seed with traits and an empty DNA container in the DNA extractor. You will obtain a DNA container with the whole DNA sequence; the seed will be destroyed in the process.
guide.planttech2.fertilizer.text:
Bonemeal does not work on PlantTech 2 crops. Instead, Fertilizer must be created by infusing Bonemeal with biomass (in the Infuser machine). There are 4 tiers of fertilizer, which may be upgraded in the Infuser as well.

Fertilizer has a chance of advancing the growth of the crop it is used on by one stage, from 5% at Tier 1 to 75% at Tier 4.
guide.planttech2.general_crossbreeding.t:
Crossbreeding is the key for renewable resources. But before starting there is some important information:

- PlantTech 2 crops act different then vanilla crops. They share some behavior, but not all.
- The crops have traits that can be improved with crossbreeding, but most of the base traits are considerably worse than vanilla - however, if properly tended they can be much more efficient.

Example: In the beginning plants will need a water source to be 1 block away, but through crossbreeding they can potentially thrive with water as far as 9 blocks away.

Please refer to the 'Crop traits' section of the Guide for detailed information.

**Also be advised that Bonemeal does not work on PlantTech 2 crops (see Fertilizer)
guide.planttech2.general_genetic_enginee: Genetic engineering is a way to create crops with selected traits. These traits need to be found first but could be used as much as you want. So, start crossbreeding your crops and develop the traits you like to have.
guide.planttech2.general_machines.text:
Machines in PlantTech 2 aren't just blocks that can be placed, they are complex symbioses of metal and plants. Therefore the process of obtaining the machines is more complex than you may be used to.
First of all the machines need a machine shell appropriate for the tier of the machine - lower tier machines need an iron machine shell, with higher tiers requiring a machine shell made from plantium. To obtain the machine shell, you need to place an Iron Block or Plantium Block next to a Carver Crop and wait.
For the plant part you need the machinebulb of the desired machine. A Machinebulb Reprocessor is required for most of these, as well as a Seed Squeezer as a bioenergy source. (These two machinebulbs are the only ones that are obtainable by crafting.) When clicking on the correct machine shell with a bulb the machine will start growing and once finished, the machine is ready.
The Machinebulb Reprocessor requires a Knowledge Chip to access higher tiers of machinebulbs. This Chip collects information from machines while they're running, as long as the machine is not a lower tier than the chip. (To start, a Knowledge Chip v0.1 may be used in a Seed Squeezer, a Tier 0 machine.) Once the Knowledge Chip has collected enough information, it may be used in the Machinebulb Reprocessor to get better machinebulbs. (And the Knowledge Chip will only gain useful data from the new Tier 1 machines.)
guide.planttech2.genetic_engineering_cro:
To make the life a bit easier, it is possible to extract genes of crops and make seeds with these genes.
This process is a bridge between the way of crossbreeding and the way of PlantTechian.
You find more information in the main category 'Genetic Engineering'
guide.planttech2.getting_started.text:
To start your career as a crossbreeder, you just need cropbars
(crafting: 4 sticks in 2x2 square) and a vanilla seed (or plantium nugget). Place the cropbars and right-click with the seeds on the cropbars, and if conditions are right the crop will grow. (If not, have a look at the next chapter.)
guide.planttech2.how_to_crossbreed.text:
When trying to get better traits - or new crop types - you need to crossbreed. This happens when a fully-grown plant spreads onto an empty cropbar that is next to another plant. The selection of the new traits/type is random with the following logic:

Type: If the parent crops are different but have a matching crossbreed result, there is a small chance the new plant will be of that type.

Traits: For each trait, the traits of the parents are compared. If they are equal, there is a small chance the trait will increased by one. Otherwise, the traits of the new crop will be in range of the parents' traits.

The traits of a crossbred crop are always unknown and will need to be revealed with the Identifier machine.
guide.planttech2.identifier.text: The Identifier is used to identify crop traits. It can also be used to convert vanilla seeds into PlantTech 2 seeds.
guide.planttech2.identify_traits.text:
The identifier is a machine that uses energy to identify the unknown traits of crops.
Just put the seeds with the unknown traits in the correct slot and the seeds will be identified in a bit.
For more information, have a look at "Machines: Identifier."
guide.planttech2.infuser.text: The Infuser infuses biomass into things like bonemeal to obtain fertilizer.
guide.planttech2.machinebulb_reprocessor: Takes energy and biomass to produce Machinebulbs. Available Machinebulbs are limited by the Knowledge Chip installed. Energy needed for each bulb: 1000.        Biomass needed: Compressor, Identifier, Energy Supplier -> 100; Infuser, Chipalyzer, Mega Furnace -> 1000; DNA Cleaner, DNA Combiner, DNA Extractor, DNA Remover, Seed Constructor, Void-Plantfarm, Solar Generator -> 2000;
guide.planttech2.mega_furnace.text: Powered with BE and has 6 slots for smelting.
guide.planttech2.multiply_crops_seeds.te: When fully grown on a cropbar, plants will spread to an empty cropbar that is immediately adjacent. This is the easiest way to multiply your stock of seeds without increasing any traits, and if the original seed was identified the traits of the new plant will also be known (provided the result was not a crossbreed; see the next chapter). Once the Fertility trait increases, extra seeds may begin to drop when a crop is harvested.
guide.planttech2.purifying_genes.text:
There will be times when you want to remove a gene entirely from a DNA sequence - this can be accomplished by placing the DNA container into the DNA Remover machine. A single gene will be selected randomly and removed from the sequence - it's not possible to select which one, so don't mess around when you only have a single container left.
In this way you can isolate a single gene.
guide.planttech2.seed_squeezer.text: The seed squeezer is a power generator fuelled by PlantTech2 seeds. The amount of power generated is determined by the seed's energy trait. Biomass is also produced, albeit at a fixed rate.
guide.planttech2.seedconstructor.text: The seedconstructor takes a sequence of dna, energy and biomass to creates seeds from it. The sequence will not be consumed. If a trait is not set in the sequence, it will be set to the default value.
guide.planttech2.solar_generator.text: The solar generator needs a solar focus to produce energy. The higher the tier of the focus, the higher the production.
guide.planttech2.test.text: XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX
guide.planttech2.void_plantfarm.text: You want to have cropproducts but don't want to have a farm consume your space? The void plantfarm takes a seed and will plant and farm the crops in the void dimension! It consumes energy to create a portal once it can harvest a crop and the production can be increased by putting a rangeupgrade in it! We can't access the dimension in person, but the machine can.
info.any_enchanted_item: Any item with this enchantment. Level doesn`t matter
info.no_space: Not enough space in your inventory
info.wrench_dismantle: Right-click while sneaking to dismantle PlantTech2 machines and cables
item.planttech2.chip_upgradepack_harvest: v2.0 Harvest Level Chip Upgrade Pack
v3.0 Harvest Level Chip Upgrade Pack
planttech2.update.available: An update for PlantTech 2 is available.
slot.chipalyzer.iteminput: Insert item to implant in empty chip
slot.compressor.select: Select result after placing particle in input slot
slot.dnacleaner.input: Insert DNA container you want to empty
slot.dnacombiner.container: Insert DNA container with traits you want to combine
slot.dnaextractor.seeds: Insert seed you want to extract traits from
slot.dnaremover.container: Insert DNA container to remove a single trait
slot.infuser.input: Insert item/block you want to infuse with biomass
slot.machinebulbreprocessor.input: Seeds placed here will be reprocessed into a Machinebulb
slot.megafurnace.input: Insert item/block you want to smelt
slot.plantfarm.storage: Drops of harvested crops will be inserted here
slot.seedconstructor.container: Insert DNA container to construct a new seed with its traits
slot.seedsqueezer.input: Insert PlantTech2 seeds that should be squeezed into biomass and energy
slot.seedsqueezer.squeeze: No input, will automatically pull from input
slot.solargenerator.focus: Insert focus to start energy production
slot.util.energyin: Insert item with energy to charge this machine
slot.util.energyout: Insert item with energy to charge the item
slot.util.energystorageupgrade: Insert Storage Upgrade to increase the energy storage
slot.util.fluidin: Insert biomass container to insert biomass
slot.util.fluidout: Insert biomass container to extract biomass
slot.util.knowledgechip: Insert Knowledge Chip to collect knowledge while machine is active (limited by the tier of the machine)
slot.util.rangeupgrade: Insert Range Upgrade to increase the production
slot.util.speedupgrade: Insert Speed Upgrade to speed up the process
